RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAZING STAR AA vied for the lead while inside, was in a long drive and drew away in late stretch. RB BESSTER vied for the lead while three wide on the backstretch, dueled two wide on the turn and stretch but weakened in late stretch. ERIN MHF was unhurried early then rallied five wide on the turn, was four wide in the stretch and was no menace. CONSEQUENTLY was unhurried early then rallied four wide on the turn and raced three wide in the stretch but was no threat. COLOR ME GONE MHF was saving ground on the turn and inside in the stretch but was no threat. THROUGHLY UPTOWN chased the early pace while three wide into the turn and faltered. VAZILLA SV vied for the lead while between horsed to the turn, was used up and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: COLOR ME GONE MHF
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground turn, inside, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: BLAZING STAR AA
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, long drive, drew off late, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: JOSEPH A OR BETTY J GILLIS

ENTRY.NAME: VAZILLA SV
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, between horses, used up, ssx

ENTRY.NAME: RB BESSTER
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide backstretch, dueled, 2w, long drive, weaken

ENTRY.NAME: CONSEQUENTLY
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, 4 wide turn, 3 wide stretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: ERIN MHF
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, 5 wide turn, 4w stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: THROUGHLY UPTOWN
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide turn, faltered,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $2,040 ATB) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000. Texas Bred Claiming Price $17,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KING OF JERSEY set a pressured pace while inside, was in a long drive in the stretch and held sway. GUSTAVO chased the early pace while three wide on the turn, made a bid in upper stretch but hung in late stretch. LOOPY DUDE rallied four wide on the turn making a bid but came up empty in late stretch. IFFY ASSET CLASS chased the early pace while two wide on the turn, made a bid then faltered in the stretch. MY CALANTE angled inside behind rivals then saving ground on the turn, made a bid then was no menace. DEVITO was unhurried early then made a mild rally in the stretch and was no menace. WILDCATS'S MEOW was unhurried early and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: King of Jersey
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, long drive, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Iffy Asset Class
ENTRY.OWNER: Robison J Kirk and Robison Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide turn, bid, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcats's Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Gustavo
ENTRY.OWNER: Mazoch Linda Mazoch Michael J and Gustafson Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide turn, bid upper stretch, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Devito
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: My Calante
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in, saved ground turn, bid, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Loopy Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied, 4 wide turn, bid, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 15000. (PLUS UP TO $2,550 ATB) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 6, 2022 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Black Fence Racing Stables and Caldwell J R

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD SCOUT set a pressured pace while three wide into the turn, drew off on the turn and was much the best. MOVER chased the early pace while four wide into the turn, made a bid but was no match for the winner in late stretch. CARBON STRYKER pressed the pace while two wide on the backstretch, was used up then faltered. SAMURAI CAUSE was unhurried early then made a late gain and was no threat. SOUL SET FREE pressed the early pace while inside, was used up then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Samurai Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late gain, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Set Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, used up, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon Stryker
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide backstretch, used up, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Good Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 3 wide, drew off turn, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mover
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 4 wide turn, bid, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $1,870 ATB) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 6, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Texas Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GREAT FACES was settled then rallied four wide on the turn, was in a long drive and powered to the front in late stretch to be best in the end. BROTHER AARON raced two wide on the turn then was inside in the stretch drive and gaining ground to be second best in the end. AFLEET SNIPER was allowed to settled then rallied four wide in upper stretch, was gaining ground and finished well. DREAMS OF VALOR pressed the early pace while three wide into the turn, was hard used then faltered. SILVER PONZI set the pace from the inside, was in a long drive but weakened in mid stretch. DRUM AND BASS was allowed to settled then rallied five wide at the top of the stretch then flattened out. OVER EZ chased the early pace while inside, was used up then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Over Ez
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, used up, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Aaron
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2 wide turn, inside stretch, gaining, second best,

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied, 5 wide 1/4 pole, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Ponzi
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, inside, long drive, weakened mid stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Dreams of Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide turn, hard used, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Sniper
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied, 4 wide stretch, gaining, finished wel

ENTRY.NAME: Great Faces
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied, 4 wide turn, long drive, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 102. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21000. (PLUS UP TO $3,570 ATB) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 6 , 2022 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAIRO WARRIOR was allowed to settled then rallied on the far turn, swung out to be four wide in upper stretch, was in a strong drive and was up in the final strides. FREEDOM FACTOR was stalking the pace while inside, saved ground on the far turn then made a bid two wide in the stretch but was out finished in the end. ENGLANDER stalked the pace while two wide on the backstretch, rallied and was in a long drive while three wide in the stretch but hung in the end. CHARLIECANDO was unhurried early then saved ground on then far turn, rallied and moved out to be four wide in the stretch but was no menace in the end. BIZZY LEGS set a well handled pace from the start, was in a long drive in the stretch and weakened in the end. RANDELLO stalked the pace while three wide, rallied on the far turn and flattened out in the drive. HALF OURS TO KEEP was allowed to settled while inside then failed to menace. DOC IRWIN was unhurried early and raced three wide on the backstretch then was no threat.

ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, long drive, weakened,

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied, swung 4w, strong drive, driving

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, saved ground, bid 2w, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Charliecando

ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground, rallied, 4 wide stretch, no menace

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide backstretch, 3w, long drive, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Randello
ENTRY.OWNER: Black Fence Racing Stables and Caldwell J R
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied, 3 wide 2nd turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Doc Irwin
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, 3 wide backstretch, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $440 ATB) FOR TEXAS ACCREDITED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.

PLAY RULE set the pace while inside, drew off on the turn and was in a long drive then was caught in late stretch. TEXAS PRADO was settled then raced two wide then saved ground on the turn then rallied two wide in the stretch and was no menace in the end. DOUBLE TRAP chased the early pace while three wide into the turn, made a bid then faltered in late stretch. KLIMCO chased the early pace while inside into the turn and faltered. INFINITE MORO was unhurried early then rallied and swung out to be four wide and closed willingly in the end. VICTOR VALENTINO was unhurried early then raced two wide on the turn and was no factor. PARABELLUM was allowed to settled while three wide on the turn and no factor. GOLIATH RIDGE was outrun. LINC'S BOY was unhurried early and no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 35000. (PLUS UP TO $1,400 ATB) FOR TEXAS ACCREDITED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENORITA BROOKE set a well handled pace while inside, drew off in upper stretch and was kept to task in the end. SATIN HEART was allowed to settled then rallied four wide in upper stretch, was in a long drive and was able to hold the place safe in the end. MY PATRIOTIC GIRL was pinched back at the start then settled, rallied two wide in the stretch and was gaining ground in late stretch. CRANKY SHEILA was pinched back at the start then settled, rallied and swung out to be five wide in upper stretch and closed well in the end. ANNA B chased the early pace while two wide, made a bid on the turn then faltered in late stretch. MOLA MIA was allowed to settled then raced inside in the stretch and was no threat. MOONPIE IN THE SKY was bumped at the start then raced four wide on the turn and was no factor. PHUNK broke out an the start and was bumped hard then used up and stopped.

ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, drew off, driving

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped hard, used up, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37000. (PLUS UP TO $6,290 ATB) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR TEXAS BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Weight, 123 lbs . Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 6, 2022 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISSION BELLE was allowed to settled then rallied four wide on the far turn, was in a strong drive and drew away in the end. PRINCESS PAULINE was unhurried early then rallied on the far turn, swung out to be five wide in upper stretch, closed fast on the outside and was second best. RED HOT MOON stalked the pace while three wide on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn and put a head in front in mid stretch then hung in late stretch. QUINN ELLA stalked the pace while inside into the far turn, made a bid two wide on turning for home but was no menace in late stretch. CHIKARA was allowed to settled in the inside early then shuffled back into the far turn, rallied and swung out to be five wide for the stretch drive and was no threat. ENDLESS ROMANCE chased the early pace while two wide, made a bid on the far turn then faltered. SILVERSCAPE set a well handled pace in the early pace, was used up on the far turn and gave way in the stretch. STREET TAPPER raced four wide on the backstretch then failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Silverscape
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, used up, gave way stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Quinn Ella
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside 2nd turn, bid 2w, stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Chikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: settle, 2 wide backstretch, rallied, 5 wide stretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Endless Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, bid 2nd turn, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide backstretch, rallied, led 1/8, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Mission Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied, 4w 2nd turn, rallied, drew off, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Pauline
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, 5 wide stretch, closed fast, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Street Tapper
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Racing Stable LLC Gorsky Bob and Circustown Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide backstretch, failed to menace,

REASON OVER RICHES was unhurried early then rallied on turn, was four wide in the stretch, was gaining ground and finished well to be second best. QUEENS HOLIDAY set the early pace and drew off on the turn, was in a long drive but weakened in mid stretch. HIGINIA chased the early pace while two wide into the far turn, made a bid to the top of the stretch then faltered in the drive. MORE THAN SHAKIN was inside then dropped back into the turn then rallied two wide in the stretch and was no menace. GOLD MEMORIES was settled then rallied three wide turning for home and failed to menace. KAYLEE'S SHADOW was inside then shuffled back on the turn, rallied two wide on the turn and no threat. THEHUNKSCLASSYLADY was saving ground on the turn then was inside in the stretch and gave way.
